roleset.name: reside (temporarily?), residing (not the place resided)
roleset.note: LODGE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'lodge' based on sentences in wsj. Verbnet entries 46, 9.10 and 9.1, Framenet entries Residence and Placing. (from lodge.01-v predicate notes)

roles.note: If you want to make the rel your Arg1, you're not looking at an eventive usage (from lodging.01-n)

example.name: near-death experience
example.text: Since his death, John has been lodging with a pleasant immigrant family in Peoria.
example.arg: with a pleasant immigrant family in Peoria

example.name: Arg0,1
example.text: His lodging in the Catskills all summer allowed him the peace and quiet he needed to finish his collection of Harry Potter fan fiction.

roleset.name: put firmly
roleset.note: LODGE-V NOTES: ergatives in lodge.02 and transitives in lodge.01 will be verydifficult to distinguish. (from lodge.02-v)
LODGED-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT. (from lodged.02-j)

example.name: troubling ergative
example.text: Once asbestos is released into the environment, it can lodge anywhere,'' says Richard A. Dennis, the assistant U.S. attorney who prosecuted the case.

example.name: all args
example.text: ``The explosion of junk bonds and takeovers has lodged a lot of insecure securities in the hands of investors and loaded the corporations that are the objects of takeovers or feared takeovers with huge amounts of debt rather than equity.
example.arg: The explosion of junk bonds and takeovers

example.name: Arg1,2
example.text: The wheel's lodging in the mud prevented the car from moving forward.

roleset.name: file a complaint
roleset.note: LODGE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'lodge' based on sentences in wsj. Verbnet entries 46, 9.10 and 9.1, Framenet entries Residence and Placing. (from lodge.03-v predicate notes)

example.name: passive gets the point across
example.text: ``With the FBI around here, bragging rights are a thing of the past,'' said one trader , referring to the federal investigation of futures trading that so far has resulted in [46 indictments]-1 lodged [*]-1 against individuals on the Merc and the Chicago Board of Trade.
example.arg: against individuals on the Merc and the Chicago Board of Trade

example.name: Arg0,1
example.text: If a complainant does not get satisfactory response from the bank within 60 days from the date of his lodging the complaint, he will have the option to approach the Office of the Banking Ombudsman concerned for redressal of his grievance/s.
